verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: claimed] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: that people had to be rescued during Hurricane Harvey last year after they " went out in their boats to watch the hurricane] .
President Trump claimed Tuesday that people [V: had] to be rescued during Hurricane Harvey last year after they " went out in their boats to watch the hurricane .
President Trump claimed Tuesday that people had to [V: be] rescued during Hurricane Harvey last year after they " went out in their boats to watch the hurricane .
President Trump claimed Tuesday that [ARG1: people] had to be [V: rescued] [ARGM-TMP: during Hurricane Harvey] [ARGM-TMP: last year] after they " went out in their boats to watch the hurricane .

President Trump claimed Tuesday that people had to be rescued during Hurricane Harvey last year after [ARG0: they] " [V: went] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG1: in their boats] [ARGM-PRP: to watch the hurricane] .
President Trump claimed Tuesday that people had to be rescued during Hurricane Harvey last year after [ARG0: they] " went out in their boats to [V: watch] [ARG1: the hurricane] .
